评论概述: Cute Dainty Little Bracelets: Only the Clasps seem to tarnish
评论详情: I really like these little bracelets. I have been wearing them for nearly a month now - they get wet when I do the dishes/clean, I wear them in the shower etc. and have held up surprisingly well. The clasp has tarnished some, and the two rings that connect the chain to the clasp have turned a silver color, but since the rest has remained gold, you don't really notice and it doesn't bother me.  I have small wrists, and even using the smallest size they still slide around a bit, but don't fall off. There was a ton of extra length on the end however, so I separated the link and took the extra off. I did catch one of them on a thread from my little one's car seat buckle, and unfortunately the small link snapped and I will have to see if I can repair it, but I would expect that since the chain and links are so dainty.  Overall I think they are a nice set, and they have held up better than I Would have expected.

This bracelet set ( C Rope/Dot/Satellite ) is very dainty and cute. You can wear them separately or together as a set. I do like the little dangling extensions which make the bracelets adjustable to almost 8" long.

评论概述: Cute, priced well, a bit too shiny for my taste
评论详情: These are very cute, dainty bracelets, with a nice set of chain types. They are priced for their quality - a good price point as a gift for a girl or younger woman, perhaps. I like this type of bracelet, for work or to dress up my day to day wear, but these are a bit too shiny and yellow compared to some of the other sets I've gotten. They are fine individually or as a set, but I cannot mix and match with other bracelets I have, due to the paler, and less realistic, color.

I've been ordering and reviewing a LOT of "gold" jewelry on Amazon, and these are pretty great!  The light buttery yellow tone of the gold is very attractive.  They seem well made and sturdy.  The clasps are easy to work.  I love the unique design of the links.  These would make a great gift!

This is a nice set of 3 gold toned bracelets. All 3 of the chain styles are attractive. They can be worn alone or all together or they also look nice mixed with some thicker bracelets. They are comfortable to wear and are very adjustable. I am sure they would fit just about any size wrist. They come in a cute little pink box.
